newsitem.title: GERMANY: German IBIS DAX falls sharply at opening.
newsitem.headline: German IBIS DAX falls sharply at opening.

text.p: FRANKFURT, April 1 ( Reuter) German shares tumbled at the opening on Tuesday after a further sharp fall on Wall Street on Monday.
The IBIS DAX index was down 87.05 points, or 2.6 percent, at 3,320.78 points in pre-bourse trade. The index fell 2.3 percent at the open.

Dealers said they expected the DAX to lose 80 to 100 points by the end of the session, but volumes might be low and the market was likely to hold off from major sell-off pending the U.S. purchasing managers' survey due in the afternoon.
